products.name: Laptop
products.description: High performance laptop with Intel Core i7 processor and NVIDIA graphics card.

reviews.comment: Good laptop, but battery life could be better.

products.name: Headphones
products.description: Wireless noise-cancelling headphones with 40-hour battery life.

reviews.comment: Best headphones I've ever owned, great sound quality and noise-cancelling.
Good headphones, but a bit uncomfortable for long periods of use.
